POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Request body accepts an object with the properties username and body, and responds with an object of the posted comment.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an existing article by article_id. Request body accepts an object with a key-value pair that increases or decreases the vote property, and responds with an object of the updated article.
